Package Hotel_Reservation_System

Class Room

java.lang.Object
Hotel_Reservation_System.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeluxeRoom, ExecutiveRoom, StandardRoom
public abstract class Room extends Object implements Reservable
Room class that holds a list of reservations

      discountCode - a String that holds the discount code if there is any

    • removeReservation

      public boolean removeReservation(String guestName, int checkIn, int checkOut)

      Specified by:
      removeReservation in interface Reservable
      Parameters:
      guestName - a String that holds the name of the guest name to be removed in the reservation
      checkIn - an integer value that holds the check-in date to be removed in the reservation
      checkOut - an integer value that holds the check-out date to be removed in the reservation
      Returns:
